reviewText: This is the kind of movie that draws your interest until the very end and with a title like "death canyon," you know things will not end well for the 6 intrepid adventure seekers; their attitude quickly changes when evil comes to find them. the found-footage style of the film is similar to other popular adventure documentary types like the blair witch project.

ALright,

This movie is not your typical horror flick! It is more fun, because it is much more realistic than you would think! :) Get it an enjoy!
